content:
* Justin believes that the idea of "build it and they will come" is total nonsense and can lead to failure in business.
* He criticizes the education system, especially in public schools, for not teaching practical skills for success in business.
* Justin advises against inventing something completely from scratch and emphasizes the importance of starting with the consumer's needs and desires.
* He stresses the need for a proper marketing plan that includes timing and segmentation to generate sales and avoid wasting time and money.
* Justin offers ad copy and consulting services to help businesses achieve results-driven action plans for their products.
